name: THE ALLIANCE FOR BANGLADESH WORKER SAFETY
sampleDescriptions: Education and advocacy regarding the efforts and accomplishments of the Alliance for Bangladesh Worker Safety in improving worker safety in the Bangladeshi ready-made garment industry.  Legislative or
